center.h2: The key technology to open mathematics to the world

page.p: As decided in Linz during the OpenMath meeting, the graphical group of the Explo-IT Research, directed by Andrea Mottola, has realized a new logo for the OpenMath Project. Based on the idea of combining the O and the M of OpenMath to draw a key, the new OpenMath logo is available in the following three formats.
page.h3: 3. A small "Powered by OpenMath" gif (88x32), to be used to reference www.openmath.org
